channel.title: [PI] Client Error
channel.description: When ever I use a c'bow my client crashes and I get this error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 500 at client.build3dScreenMenu(client.java:5304) at client.processRightClick(client.java:6833) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9706) at client.method146(client.java:13226) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8688) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9643) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:202) at client.run(client.java:5132) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] Can someone help me out?

item.title: [PI] Client Error
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Please post lines 5300 - 5308 from client.java.

For future reference please post in the correct board regarding client issues:
Client Help

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client Error
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Out of bounds means in english, lmao. The number 500 is past the highest number being called… trying to explain this so you understand. make sure you figure out what the bounds are. in that method ofc.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client Error
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

When ever I use a c’bow my client crashes and I get this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 500 at client.build3dScreenMenu(client.java:5304) at client.processRightClick(client.java:6833) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9706) at client.method146(client.java:13226) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8688) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9643) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:202) at client.run(client.java:5132) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Can someone help me out?

Read full topic
